title: Weird, Loud and Toxic: Deal With Your Co-Workers’ Annoying Quirks
sub_head: What’s acceptable at the office seems to have shifted for some people. Here are ways to reset boundaries and maintain your sanity.
body:
They’re taking Zoom calls without headphones. They’re strolling over to your desk in sweaty gym clothes. And, yup, they’re microwaving fish again.
Were our co-workers always this annoying?
